type: App Message - Updating Your Local App

definition.text: Write here a summary for this topic page.

translations.text: The app is checking your selected current branch of the Superalgos repository for a new version. Hold on!

paragraphs.text: Left click and Edit to enter edit mode and change this text. ENTER to write new paragraphs. ESC to exit edit mode.

translations.text: You will soon get a notice informing you whether a new version was found or if the version you are running is the latest available!
